chapter.title: Automate Web Services
chapter.para: This chapter describes web services used by CloudForms Management Engine Automate Feature Set.

formalpara.title: At the end of this chapter, you will:

listitem.para: Know what web service methods are available to Automate.
Be familiar with the parameters that each method can take.
See examples of the outputs for each method.

chapter.para: Web Services associated with Automate pertain to creating automated workflows and provisioning. For each Web service, we supply a brief description, input, output, the excerpt from the WSDL, and a sample output.
You can find a full copy of the WSDL file in the WSDL File Appendix.
